block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: HC-SR04 超声波测距传感器 HC-SR04 Ultrasonic Distance Sensor
连接需要 2 个引脚 第一个是触发引脚 第二个是回声引脚 2 pin required for connection 1st is Trigger pin 2nd is Echo pin

触发引脚将发出 2ms 的脉冲，使超声波发射器发出 2ms 的超声波 回声引脚用于接收从超声波接收器前方的物体反射回来的超声波 触发到回声之间的时间用于计算距离 The trigger pin is will send a pulse of 2ms to cause the ultrasonic transmitter to send 2ms of ultrasonic sound The echo pin is used to receive the ultrasonic sound bounced back from an object in front of the ultrasonic receiver The time of between trigger to echo is used to calculate the distance Distance = (Speed of Sound x Time)
返回值为距离（单位：毫米） The return value is distance in mm
连续读取HC-SR04并显示读数 continuously reading from HC-SR04 and display the readings
